description: Warm up with a roasted sweet potato soup topped with crispy potato skins, cashews, chilli and coriander. Serve it with toasted Lebanese bread for dunking.
name: Healthier Roasted Sweet Potato Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Ladle soup among bowls and drizzle with remaining milk. Season with pepper. Top with potato skins, chilli, cashews and coriander. Serve with bread.
